{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3001956,"name":"Eric Bergquist","username":"kitare102","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kitare102/{size}/212327_2.png","created_at":"2022-02-02T17:57:18.556Z","cooked":"

I just got the email that the Climber in a Box is back in stock but all options on the website are listed as out of stock. Has anyone else experienced this? Can anyone at AndyMark comment on how things are looking over there?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2022-02-02T17:57:18.556Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":24,"reads":285,"readers_count":284,"score":177.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":402014,"topic_slug":"andymark-climber-stocking","display_username":"Eric Bergquist","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":23148,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Coach Eric, FRC 3100 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/andymark-climber-stocking/402014/1","custom_user_title":"Coach Eric, FRC 3100 Mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3001964,"name":"","username":"5809coach","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/5/c67d28/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-02-02T18:06:20.238Z","cooked":"

Similar experience here. Actually got as far as having them in the cart (two different times: first with, then without, extrusion) but having them removed at check out before being able to complete the order. Would be interested to know ETAs on restock (as they’ve been accurate online so far, though seemingly with very small numbers available when they do become available)

Nick Lawrence addresses this here:

AndyMark Climber in a Box Assembly Notes Kit & Additional Hardware
Hi there! Thanks for the feedback on the assembly instructions. We’ll work on some of these improvements. We detailed the rope tying method in this short video here, it’s a bit complicated to explain in text form. This method was tested on a real robot in real offseason competition in the summer and fall of 2021. All, we’re turning on sales today for a limited amount of full climbers with extrusions, and a large amount of climbers without extrusions. We have a limited supply of the thin wall…

I believe thriftybot has (extrusionless) kits in stock. I am partial to the design of the thriftybot climber. Might want to give it a look if you are time constrained and don’t have a specific reason to use the Andymark kit
